label: Cpipe-2.4

inputs.doc: bed File containing coordinates for intersection of exons and library captures sites.
bed file containing coordinates for intersection of exons and library captures sites.
Coordinates for regions discovered requiring realignment.
Bed file containing the coordinates for genes/regions to be targeted.

steps.doc: recalibrate quality scores and export to a table. Recalibration performed by readgroup (representing sequencing lanes).

inputs.doc: Coordinates for regions discovered requiring realignment.

steps.doc: perform realignment and generate new vcf with updated coords.

inputs.doc: bed file containing the coordinates for genes/regions to be targeted.

outputs.doc: Coordinates for regions discovered requiring realignment.

steps.doc: dentify sites in need of realignment using known indel sites as a guide. Sites with high mutation levels also targeted for inspection and potential realignment.

specs: Shell script to convert vcf file to table. Import requirement for LOVD+.

run.doc: Apply hard quality filters on variants
Script to handle and remove multiple transcripts. Preference for known vs predicted impacts.

steps.doc: merge filtered indel and snv vcfs
extract indel mutations only. This is necessary so that indel-specific filters can be applied.
extract all but indel mutations types so that hard filters can be applied.

steps.label: fastQC version 0.11.5
steps.doc: Initial and cursory check for common issues arising as part of the sequencing process related to read quality. Separate reports generated for each lane x read.
apply variant effect prediction tools and populate the vcf file.

inputs.doc: bed file containing the coordinates for genes/regions to be targeted.

steps.doc: simultaneous call of indels and snvs across target region sites. dbsnp ID annotated to file for referencing purposes.

steps.label: gatk-genotypeGVCF version 3.6
steps.doc: genotypeGVCF is a redundant stage for singleton pipeline. Stage is performed but functionality not relevant to downstream stages. Sample-by-sample calling employed for sample consistency and independence.

specs: Part of the reporting script. Determines sex of sample by extracting coverage values for sex chromosomes. Output is written to the qc report.
In-house script to calculate on-target statistics.
In-house script to calculate fragment statistics.

inputs.doc: Forward reads produced as a part of a paired-end sequencing experiment. Multiple file inputs when libraries are pooled across >1 lanes
Reverse reads produced as a part of a paired-end sequencing experiment. Multiple file inputs when libraries are pooled across >1 lanes
